item.description:
Our member Michael Burgan has a play submitted in this, lets come out in numbers and support Michael, bring your friends, the more people that turn out the better. I hear the ticket is probably $10.00 in advance, the box office will open up this event, one month prior to the opening date, so I am guessing you will be able to purchase on January 17th.

The Valley Repertory Company presents:
Second LabWorks 15-Minute New Play Contest

Mirror Touch
by Michael Burgan
William catches a man about to break the cardinal rule of the museum…no touching the artwork. But the man is not just any art lover: his special gift lets him experience a new dimension of great art through his hands. William is unimpressed until he realizes that unfulfilled dreams leave lasting scars.

plus much more...

 

http://www.valleyrep....
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the front lobby, I will wear the bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: Second LabWorks 15-Minute New Play Contest
